name: Outbreak: The Undying Collection
description:
Enter the world of survival horror with Outbreak: The Undying Collection bundle!

The outbreak reaches new heights in Outbreak: Epidemic, an action-focused survival horror adventure. Featuring the great Outbreak series gameplay with greater mobility, crushing difficulty and more camera options than ever before. You'll fight through the Campaign story mode, the wave-based Onslaught Mode and all new Experiments Mode scenarios. Choose your survivor, class and level up to unlock new buffs for your survivor as you face the nightmare.

Experience a mother's desperate search for her lost daughter amidst a nation-wide epidemic in Outbreak: Lost Hope. Featuring all new over-the-shoulder gameplay, you'll need to solve puzzles, scavenge for supplies and beat back the undead to survive. Includes the complete Story Mode and Onslaught Mode experiences. Can you survive and save your daughter?

Witness first hand Lydia's fight for survival in Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles as she is separated from the survivors and forced to explore a deserted manor alone. Featuring a dedicated story experience with all the trappings of fixed-camera classic survival horror, you'll need to explore, scrounge and battle the undead to survive. Also includes the extra Battle Mode where you must fight your way through each room towards the exit with very limited resources.

Take the fight for survival to the streets in Outbreak: The New Nightmare. Featuring fixed camera angles and classic survival horror gameplay, you'll need to fight your way out of the infection zone and attempt to find refuge within the mountains. But the survivors will learn a horrible truth in the process... Featuring the full Story mode, the wave based Onslaught experience and the all new Experiments mode which features a unique spin on survival horror.

Finally, fight through the remains of Arzt Memorial Hospital in Outbreak as you pick from a wide cast of survivors and attempt to survive the nightmare. Play through the story in the Campaign Mode, fight waves of the undead in Onslaught Mode and then experience small survival horror vignettes in the Nightmares mode.

You only have one life. Can you survive the nightmare?
